arguments.heading: Kremlin and Ukraine Summit
arguments.subheading: Diplomatic Efforts to End the War

arguments.title: Discussion Points
items: Imminent Summit Between Putin and Zelensky

arguments.situation: US President met Putin and welcomed European leaders and Zelensky to the White House.
arguments.complication: Kremlin played down talk of a summit between Putin and Zelensky.
arguments.question: Will a bilateral meeting take place to discuss ending the war in Ukraine?
arguments.answer: The possibility remains uncertain, with Russia and Ukraine having differing positions.

arguments.headline: Trump's Renewed Call for Talks
supports: Trump met with Putin and European leaders.
Acknowledged the complexity and challenges in resolving the conflict.

arguments.keyMessage: Direct Talks Needed for Conflict Resolution
